a.n: TECHNO-SCIENCE - EL DESAFIO CIENTIFICO EN EL CAMBIO CLIMATICO

p.k: Andrea Obaid and Cristián Campos visit the south of our country. Andrea goes to Dichato to study the effects of hypoxia, lack of oxygen at sea. Cristián addresses Aysén, Puerto Tranquilo, Maldonado, for marine studies and to see how climate change affects the flora and fauna of these sectors; as is the forest of Maldonado. Both show studies conducted by universities of our country. In Dichato, the University of Concepción; and Aysen, the Catholic University with its various faculties.
